title: Executive Order 5560-Amendment of Schedule A, Positions Excepted from Examination Under the Civil Service Rules
content: Schedule A, positions excepted from the requirement of examination under the civil service rules, is hereby amended by the addition of a new subdivision, to be numbered XXII, as follows:
1. One private secretary or confidential clerk to each member of the Federal Power Commission.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5560-Amendment of Schedule A, Positions Excepted from Examination Under the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361190
